ChatMapperProject.Title: ORILE Warmup
ChatMapperProject.Author: SGI
ChatMapperProject.Description: Project configured for the Dialogue System for Unity.

Field.Hint: A name to reference this actor.
Field.Title: Name

Field.Hint: A collection of image files that represent this actor, used as portrait images.
Field.Title: Pictures

Field.Hint: A short description of what makes this actor unique.
Field.Title: Description

Field.Hint: Mark this box if this actor is the main player character.
Field.Title: IsPlayer

Field.Hint: A name to reference this item or quest. Use underscores instead of spaces so simulator Lua code works.
Field.Title: Name

Field.Hint: A description of this item or quest.
Field.Title: Description

Field.Hint: The description of the quest when the player has completed it successfully.
Field.Title: Success Description

Field.Hint: The description of the quest when the player has completed it in failure.
Field.Title: Failure Description

Field.Hint: The state of the quest: unassigned, active, success, or failure
Field.Title: State

Field.Hint: When using the quest system, set this True to mark the item as an actual item rather than a quest.
Field.Title: Is Item

Field.Hint: A name to reference this location.
Field.Title: Name

Field.Hint: A collection of image files that represent this location.
Field.Title: Pictures

Field.Hint: A short description of what this location looks like.
Field.Title: Description

Field.Title: Conversant

Field.Hint: The text that is spoken by the actor.
Field.Title: Dialogue Text
Field.Value: This is your Office and you will find your work table here.

Field.Title: Menu Text

Field.Hint: The text that is spoken by the actor.
Field.Title: Dialogue Text
Field.Value: As a Sales Manager, your role is to check and verify the documents then send them to your colleagues for further processing.

Field.Hint: The text that is spoken by the actor.
Field.Title: Dialogue Text
Field.Value: You will not be able to sign any of the documents but it will be of great help if you check through the documents before you send them.

Field.Hint: The text that is spoken by the actor.
Field.Title: Dialogue Text
Field.Value: Your main role will be to go around the Sales Floor and attend to the customers and increase your sales.
